claim: 0% of commander-legal cards lack a content warning; every such card includes a content warning.
extra_info: do not have a content warning refers to hasContentWarning = 0; percentage refers to DIVIDE(COUNT(hasContentWarning = 0),COUNT(ID))*100 where format = 'commander' AND Status = 'legal';
reasoning: The claim states that 0% of commander-legal cards lack a content warning (hasContentWarning=0) and every such card includes one. However, the data shows that 100% of the 55,235 commander-legal cards have hasContentWarning=0 (no content warning), and 0 cards have hasContentWarning=1. This is the exact opposite of what the claim asserts.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN c.hasContentWarning = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as no_warning,
  SUM(CASE WHEN c.hasContentWarning = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_warning,
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN c.hasContentWarning = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(*) as pct_no_warning
FROM cards c
JOIN legalities l ON c.uuid = l.uuid
WHERE l.format = 'commander' AND l.status = 'Legal';
"

content.thinking:
The query shows that out of 55,235 commander-legal cards, ALL 55,235 have hasContentWarning = 0 (no content warning), and 0 have hasContentWarning = 1. The percentage of cards without a content warning is 100%, not 0%.

The claim says "0% of commander-legal cards lack a content warning; every such card includes a content warning." This means the claim asserts that all commander-legal cards HAVE a content warning. But the data shows the opposite - ALL commander-legal cards LACK a content warning (hasContentWarning = 0).

So the claim is CONTRADICTED.
